THIS-363 MD5 hashing of long constraint ids (#1295)

# Description

Fixes an issue where container constraint IDs longer than 43 characters
caused errors.
Now, such IDs are hashed using MD5, we keep 1/2 of the original id,
remaining is replaced by MD5 hash.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Fixed

- Constraint IDs >=43 chars are now replace 1/2 original 1/2 MD5-hashed
